medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started yesterday morning, localized in the right lower quadrant. Patient reports no nausea or vomiting, did not note fever at home but presented with a temperature of 100.2. Decreased appetite since yesterday, and reports a similar episode several months ago that resolved on its own.
